title: New & MPfree: Ne-Yo & jj – We Can’t Stop
content: In possibly the most perfectly matched collaboration of the year, American R&B star Ne-Yo has teamed up with Swedish pop duo jj to produce an exclusive track for the Adult Swim series. We Can’t Stop was recorded by Ne-Yo before being sent over to Elin Kastlander and Joakim Benon, in order for them to add their own creative touch. The dream pop of jj works fantastically well when pitted against the slick, soulful sound of Ne-Yo, bringing about the shimmering, heartfelt We Can’t Stop. When Ne-Yo enters midway through the track, their are risks of it morphing into into a glorified remix, however the continued inclusion of jj samples and choruses instead turn it into an epic R&B number. Stream and download the track below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
